item.title: Launching your first AI project with a grain of RICE: Weighing reach, impact, confidence and effort to create your roadmap
item.description: A new framework inspired by the RICE scoring model balances business value, time-to-market, scalability and risk for your first AI project.

item.title: OpenAI’s strategic gambit: The Agents SDK and why it changes everything for enterprise AI
item.description: OpenAI's new API and Agents SDK consolidate a previously fragmented complex ecosystem into a unified, production-ready framework. For enterprise AI te...

item.title: Lovelace Studio uses AI to help players build survival craft sandbox worlds
item.description: Lovelace Studio is using generative AI to build Nyric, a tool that can help bring gaming worlds to life for player builders who work in harmony.

item.title: 51 seconds to breach: How CISOs are countering AI-driven, lightning-fast deepfake, vishing and social engineering attacks
item.description: Attackers can breach a network in 51 seconds. CISOs fight back with zero-trust, AI-based threat detection & instant session token revocation.

item.title: Moonvalley’s Marey is a state-of-the-art AI video model trained on FULLY LICENSED data
item.description: Marey enables filmmakers to create using storyboards, sketches, and even live-action references, making it more intuitive for pros.
